version_description:
- support for iPad1 and iPod4 - better frame rate, more stable
- slightly increased Mr Talonted's Slam Dunk stun time
- slightly decreased Mr Talonted level 1 Dash damage
- player gets a small amount of gold for calling in next wave early
- fixed bug with sheep not appearing in level 2
- fixed issue with poseidon not stunning longer when upgraded in game
- better feedback when shrine is full
- new charging ring feedback for Mr Talonted's Dash, Hercules's Stomp as well as shrine cooldown
- new popup when a player purchases something from the store

- AWESOME NEW HERO AVAILABLE: Play as the deadly Siren!
- new item in the store: laZboy bundle.
- 5 new hats for your hero to wear!
- improved the Centaur's magic bolt targeting.
- added Game Center achievements.

- NEW QUEST: Help Daedulus find all of his dropped presents in exchange for a Secret Santa hat!
- BRAND NEW HERO AVAILABLE: Play as the fiery, merciless Phoenix!
- SNAZZIER SIREN: We upgraded Nina Sea-mone's visuals to match her lethal skills. Check it out!
- ENERGY: We're phasing out energy so you can play without energy limitations!
FIXED ISSUES: Start up and World 4 Crashes, squashed miscellaneous bugs

- NEW HERO SKILL: We revamped the Siren's SPELLSONG skill to make it stronger! Now she traps GROUPS of enemies for your gods to easily destroy. Check her out in the HEROES section!

- FIXED ISSUES: squashed miscellaneous bugs

- LOTS-O-PRETTY NEW PICTURES: Check out the new and improved UI, brand new splash screen, and improved World 2 art!

- NEW TUTORIAL & COMICS: We added a shiny new tutorial for first-time players, including introductory comics.

- NEW STORE BUNDLES: We added new power-up bundles with better value for you. Check them out in the store!

- FIXED ISSUES: squashed miscellaneous bugs!
- FIXED ISSUES: Improved download and squashed miscellaneous bugs!

- NEW HERO FIRETONGUE: Born from the heart of a volcano, Firetongue is one metric ton of fire, muscle, and very bad temper.

- NEW HERO ICEFANG: The living embodiment of winter, Icefang rolls over her enemies like an unstoppable avalanche. Just the sight of her can freeze the bravest in their tracks.

- TAVERN HERO RENTAL: Heroes have started gathering in the Tavern, relaxing and sharing tall tales. Head over and hire one now to keep them in shape!

- FIXED ISSUES: Squashed miscellaneous bugs!

SPECIAL EVENT: It's Chinese New Year and the Nian Monster is wrecking havoc on Olympus! Slay the beasts in return for some nice Hats!

GEMS: The the nectar of the Gods, save up Gems to permanently own Heroes, Power-Ups, Hats, and other goodies!

ONLINE FEATURES: Claim your account to play across multiple devices!

NEW HERO: The Monkey King joins Olympus to help defeat the Nian Monster!
A small update to squash some pesky bugs while we prepare World 5 for the next version!

EGYPTIAN WORLD: 7 brand new levels, new enemies to challenge your wits, and play with new level tiles that offer you even more strategy!

NEW GODS: Anubis and Ra joins the Greek Pantheon. Anubis revelas hidden enemies, Ra offer you more gold in the levels!

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

UPGRADED: Added 64-bit support
FIXED ISSUES: Squashed miscellaneous bugs!

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

UPGRADED: Added 64-bit support
FIXED ISSUES: Squashed miscellaneous bugs!

- Griffin (Mr. Talonted) is now more intimidating
- Fixed issue with available 3 star soul rewards not displaying correctly
- Buffed up Centaur's (Clyde S. Dale) damage in general
- Buffed up lightning shrine damage a little bit
- Shrines are now disabled before level starts
- Soul images in store are now much shinier
